page.enlisting:
• Digital Filtering of input signals ◆ necessary for 132 ns operation ◆ improves ET estimate at all beam crossing rates • Jet/EM/tau clustering using ATLAS sliding-window algorithm ◆ jets broader than 0.2x0.2 Trigger Towers (TT) ◆ cluster topology cuts possible • Digital Filtering of input signals
